content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 0, Sporting de Gijón 1.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 0, Sporting de Gijón 1.

Foul by Nacho Cases (Sporting de Gijón).
Attempt saved. Jony (Sporting de Gijón) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Offside, Sporting de Gijón. Alberto Lora tries a through ball, but Álex Serrano is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Marco Asensio (Mallorca) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Pau Cendrós.
